snippet: Corey Dickerson had two long balls and two doubles as Colorado batters piled up 11 extra-base hits against Cincinnati.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Colorado Rockies rout the Cincinnati Reds, 11-2; other MLB scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Corey Dickerson had two long balls and two doubles as Colorado batters piled up 11 extra-base hits against Cincinnati.

headline.main: Lyles Improves to 5-0 as Rockies’ Bats Account for Five Home Runs in Rout of Reds
headline.print_headline: Lyles Improves to 5-0 as Rockies’ Bats Account for Five Home Runs in Rout of Reds
